when: canAlign(bt) and not aligned(bt, vars.frontline_engagement.angle, vars.frontline_engagement.distance)

actions.when: bt and bt.distance <= vars.frontline_engagement.distance and following(bt)
actions.comment: Stop following and face the enemy if we're close to the mob.

actions.when: bt and bt.distance <= vars.frontline_engagement.distance and not facingEnemy()
actions.comment: Keep facing the enemy as we fight.

actions.when: bt and bt.distance > vars.frontline_engagement.distance and not following(bt)
actions.comment: Maintain a minimum distance from the enemy.

commands: not following(bt) and follow(bt, vars.frontline_engagement.distance) and log('Unexpected: Initiated melee range following')
debug('Getting into frontline position with distance =', bt.distance)
actions.comment: Ensure that we get into melee range without executing later actions.
